definitions.body: ; of Obed-edom 2Sa 6:10, 2Sa 6:11 = 1Ch 13:13; Ittai 2Sa 15:19, 2Sa 15:22, 2Sa 18:2; Goliath 2Sa 21:19, 1Ch 20:5; pl. c. art. as subst., [[הַגִּתִּים]] 1Sa 15:18 the Gittites (but read [[אִתַּי הַגִּתִּי]]We Klo Kit Bu Now:Arch.i.308n.); sg. c.art. as n.pr.coll. [[הַגִּתִּי]] Jos 13:3 (with men of Gaza, Ashdod, Ashḳelon, Eḳron, and the Awwim).
